[00:11.71]Didn't even really wanna go
[00:14.60]But if you get me out, you get a show
[00:17.02]There's so many bodies on the floor
[00:19.62]So baby we should go and add some more
[00:22.66]Are you down, d-d-down, d-d-down, d-d-down, down, down?

[00:34.23]Everywhere I look are peoples' hands
[00:36.90]Thrown up in the air to help them dance
[00:39.73]Come on, baby, catch me if you can
[00:42.11]I know you don't have any other plans
